mapper.insert: insert into review ( review_score, review_content, review_date, product_idx, user_idx ) values( #{review_score}, #{review_content}, now(), #{product_idx}, #{user_idx})
mapper.delete: delete from review where user_idx = #{user_idx} and product_idx = #{product_idx} and review_idx = #{review_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_idx, r.review_score, r.review_content, r.review_date, p.product_idx, p.product_name, u.user_idx, u.user_id FROM review r INNER JOIN product p ON r.product_idx = p.product_idx INNER JOIN user u ON r.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE p.product_idx = #{product_idx}
